backend/main.mo: Defines core resident-related types and comparison utilities, and incorporates authorization and blob‑storage mixins into the main actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two resilience-related frontend features to their affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Flat JSON-style list summarizing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the deployment_logs directory is committed.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment checklist for Version 89 with manual and scripted deployment steps plus quick smoke-test requirements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions using OKLCH variables with light/dark mode values and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Bash script that rebuilds and redeploys version 89 to the IC network, logging all output and saving canister IDs for diagnostics.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Comprehensive Version 89 smoke-test guide detailing prerequisites, test steps, and expected results for core user flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry handling identity, resilient actor initialization, startup health checks, routing, and error fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for adding an ADL record to a resident, validating inputs and submitting via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog form for recording a resident’s daily vital signs, converting units and timestamps before submitting.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for adding a medication administration record, selecting active meds and submitting with timestamp and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog for adding a new medication to a resident, collecting dosage, route, schedule, and physician info before saving.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: UI component that displays startup errors with diagnostics, authentication status, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching hooks for profiles and related entities using actors, with timeout handling and resilient variants for startup.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Hook that creates a backend actor with timeout and best‑effort admin initialization, avoiding retries and providing error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration including color variables, dark mode, dialog overrides, and detailed print styles.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides timeout wrapping, error normalization, and utilities for detecting and classifying backend canister errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds safe asset URLs using Vite's base path while preventing double slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Generates frontend build metadata including version, timestamp, commit, and environment.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts between date strings and nanoseconds and formats dates without timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Extracts backend connection info and performs a timeout‑safe health check on the backend canister.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized timeout values for startup, health checks, and resident data loading.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the resident management dashboard with filtering, sorting, admin actions, and data queries.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the Internet Identity login screen with branding and loading feedback.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: React page displaying a resident profile, loading resident data, handling dialogs for editing info and adding records, and managing medication and vitals interactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, shadows, keyframes, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking features, issues, and pending requests related to backend connectivity and startup health checks.
